#include <iostream>
#include <map>

using namespace std;

int main() {
	// your code goes here
	int n;
	
	cin >> n;
	int val;
	
	map<int, int> m;
	for(int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
		cin >> val;
		m[val]++;
	}
	
	long long ans = ((long long)(n)*(n-1))/2;
	
	map<int, int> :: iterator it;
	
	for(it = m.begin(); it != m.end(); it++) {
		ans -= (long long)((it->second))*(it->second - 1)/2;
	}
	
	cout << ans << endl;
	return 0;
}
